Header: SLMA Officer Cadets Familiarize with SFHQ – West Affairs
Content: A group of 71 Officer Cadets under training at the Sri Lanka Military Academy (SLMA) as part of their familiarization projects called at the Security Force Headquarters – West (SFHQ-West) at Panagoda on Monday (11). On behalf of Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander, Security Forces – West, Major B.S.C Padmakumara, General Staff Officer 2 (Training) welcomed them and presented a comprehensive briefing on the role and tasks, history and responsibilities of the SFHQ – West. Towards the end of the arrangement, those visiting Officer Cadets presented a memento to the  Staff Officer 2 at the SFHQ – West.
